awards:
第34届圣丹斯电影节(2018)
　　评审团大奖 世界电影单元纪录片(提名)
this_title: This is Home: A Refugee Story
introduction: Only 21,000 Syrian refugees out of five million have been accepted into the United States since 2011. This is Home follows four families sent to resettle in Baltimore in 2016. They have just eight months to find jobs, learn English, and become self-sufficient. The clock starts right when they land. Despite good intentions, a vast cultural divide prevents the new arrivals and th...
foreign_title: This is Home: A Refugee Story
